title: Arjuna Arjuna Lyrics Aai
stanzas: <div>Arjuna Arjuna Lyrics Aai

Arjuna arjuna
ambu vidum arjuna
ambinaal ambinaal
ullam thaitha arjuna (2)

kanavile kadavulai kandal
thoongidum kuzhandhai
sirikkum.

nerile unnai kandaal
en manam thulli kudhikkum

nila nila nee vaa vaa vaa
nillaamal neeyum oadi vaa

Arjuna arjuna
ambu vidum arjuna
ambinaal ambinaal
ullam thaitha arjuna

chellamaai sandai potu
kobamaai muraithu paarthu
konjalaai ennai thitta
vaa vaa vaa

menmaiyaai ennai anaithu
penmaiyin aasai purindhu
ennaiye seendi paarka
vaa vaa vaa

thoongukinra un azhagai
kandal kandal endhan
ullam poothiduven

thookkathile thookathile
unnai enni unnai ennai
punnagaippen

vaiyyile irukindra
unniralai Â paarthaele
veyarvai adhu thudikkum
kaikuttai ena idhayam maaridume

nila nila nee vaa vaa vaa
nillaamal neeyum oadi vaa

Arjuna arjuna
ambu vidum arjuna
ambinaal ambinaal
ullam thaitha arjuna

vizhigale kaanaa thooram
tholaivil ne ilukkum podhum
arugile unnai paarpen
hey hey hey

iruvarin imaigal serum
arugil ne irukkum podhum
therindhuthaan ennai
tholaippen hey hey hey

oppu konden oppu konden
ennil indru naanum illai
oppu koden.

ottikonden ottrikonden
undhan ullam alli alli
ottrikonden

nijangal adhu poiyaaga
poigal adhu nijamaaga
kadhal adhil undu
pala kulappam
adhai naanum arindhene

Arjuna arjuna
ambu vidum arjuna
ambinaal ambinaal
ullam thaitha arjuna

kanavile kadavulai kandal
thoongidum kuzhandhai
sirikkum.

nerile unnai kandaal
en manam thulli kudhikkum

nila nila nee vaa vaa vaa
nillaamal neeyum oadi vaa
